message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its unique value and features, I'm asking for $22,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but the value this product brings is truly unique. Let's meet in the middle â€“ how about $18,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $14,000, but that's as high as I can go.
